synopsis: Rito is having a hard time adjusting when Lala's sisters move in...a really hard time. Momo's attempted seductions leave Rito frazzled--and then there's still the pressure of his unannounced love for Haruna.

title.jp: Doubt and Dish: Giwaku to Ryouri

synopsis: Rito learns that Yami still wants to kill him, and now she's an overnight guest in his house! However, it's not all rage and resentment! Momo continually tries to seduce Rito.
Momo is intent on making Project Harem a reality...and she almost succeeds. Meanwhile, Mea begins to shake things up and prepares to welcome a dark force!

The vindictive Azenda the Tyrant comes to Earth to provoke Yami into fighting again. Later, Haruna and Rito have yet another awkward encounter, and Mikan and Yami grow closer...so close that Yami compromises her old assassin beliefs.

title.jp: A Man? A Woman? Changing Ones

synopsis: Rito dodges potential encounters with women--and all their respective parts!--but he soon gets a firsthand look at the female anatomy...and not in the good way!
Momo teaches Rito about the secrets of the female body and seeks to move Project Harem forward. Meanwhile, Rito learns about Ren and Run.
Rito is confused by his sudden feelings for Lala; true to fashion, things get awkward quickly! Momo and Mea also discover the true and endearing nature of Lala.

Rito begins to get closer with Momo, which makes Mikan feel uncomfortable and misplaced. After Rin helps her during a near collapse while walking home, Mikan can no longer hold her tongue and begins to vent.
That Lala and her inventions. One of her crazy contraptions ends up getting Rito and Yami stuck to each other by their hands!
The truth needs to come out. Yami finally begins telling Rito about her past, and explains how she came to be.
The Organization is on the move and Yami is the firs target! Meanwhile, Lala learns of a new enemy that may be closer than she thinks.

Momo takes to playing dating sims to figure out how to get her harem plan under way. At school, a group of students form a Momo fan club, which ends up keeping her away from Rito, who she is beginning to fall in love with.
